message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI

The paper proposes a novel approach to text segmentation using ontological similarity, which is relevant to several sub-categories in computer science. The use of ontologies and semantic web technologies suggests that cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also mentions the relevance of the proposed method to Information Retrieval (IR), which suggests cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The use of clustering algorithms and machine learning techniques suggests cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper's focus on text segmentation and its potential applications in various natural language processing tasks suggests cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
